name: Andrew Scott Cooper
goal:
I am a research and writing consultant.

My current project is to research and write a technical book that explores the global phenomenon of political and religious extremism, and also to assess policy responses at all levels.

I would like to attend events, hearing and meetings that cover this important subject area.
interests: External Relations, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence
euInitiatives: I am registered in Belgium as an Independent contractor/consultant. I am most interested in EU initiatives, policies and legislation that allies to combatting radicalization and extremism.
